headline: WTW Completes Acquisition of Newfront
summary: Expands WTW’s reach in U.S. middle market and accelerates execution of technology and specialty strategies through Newfront’s AI and automation technology and high-growth industry expertiseNewfront now operating as part of WTW LONDON, Jan. 27, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- WTW (NASDAQ: WTW) (the “Company”), a leading global advisory, broking and solutions company, today announced that it has completed the previously announced acquisition of Newfront, a San Francisco-based, top 40 U.S. broker combinin
